font-lovers-lettering-brushes.install_instructions:
Installing Procreate Brushes

Procreate brushes are some of a growing group of tools on Creative Market that work solely on a mobile device. Procreate is an app for iPad only, so Creative Market’s Procreate brushes will only work on an iPad with Procreate app installed. These brushes are amazing tools to use with your mobile stylus that will help you start sketching, lettering, and drawing in a variety of effects.

Install Guide

Note: These brushes were designed specifically for use in Procreate (not Illustrator, or Photoshop), so they are only compatible with Procreate. An Apple Pencil was used to create and test all of the brushes. For this reason, I’m unable to guarantee the same results with other 3rd party styluses. If you’d like to test some of my free brushes for compatibility, they can be found at http://TuesdayTribe.com
font-lovers-lettering-brushes.intro_description:
Lettering Lovers

If you love lettering, vectorizing your lettering or preparing your lettering for font making, this brush set was made for you!

This custom Procreate lettering brush set includes 20 unique lettering brushes. 8 of those brushes were specifically designed for vectorization in Adobe Illustrator (check out the preview image above to see em in action!).

This pack is filled with 15 unique, metallic accented textures, each in 3 colorways for a total of 45 textures! 15 Isolated gold textures are also included to add a punch of shine to any colored or textured background. All ink and gold textures come as high res (300dpi) transparent pngs and are sized at least 2000px on their longest side. This makes them beautiful and crisp on all common print + web applications!

Here’s what’s included:

  • 20 unique lettering brushes
  • 8 of those brushes were specifically designed for vectorization in Adobe Illustrator
  • Pressure sensitive brushes perfect for faux-ligraphy

Brush settings vary from pressure sensitive brushes perfect for faux-ligraphy (check out the signature marker + jittery ink brushes!), to mono weight brushes (see the mono marker + round marker), to brushes perfect for sketching out your lettering (hello, pencil sketch and smooth pencil!). Whatever style you’re inspired by or plan to bring to life, this comprehensive, diverse set will give you plenty of options to make it happen.

seo.title: Font Lovers Procreate Lettering Brushes
seo.desc: This custom procreate lettering brush set includes 20 unique lettering brushes. 8 of those were specifically designed for vectorization in Adobe Illustrator

procreate-watercolor-lettering-brush-pac.install_instructions:
Installing Procreate Brushes

Procreate brushes are some of a growing group of tools on Creative Market that work solely on a mobile device. Procreate is an app for iPad only, so Creative Market’s Procreate brushes will only work on an iPad with Procreate app installed. These brushes are amazing tools to use with your mobile stylus that will help you start sketching, lettering, and drawing in a variety of effects.

Install Guide

Note: These brushes were designed specifically for use in Procreate (not Illustrator, or Photoshop), so they are only compatible with Procreate. An Apple Pencil was used to create and test all of the brushes. For this reason, I’m unable to guarantee the same results with other 3rd party styluses. If you’d like to test some of my free brushes for compatibility, they can be found at http://TuesdayTribe.com
procreate-watercolor-lettering-brush-pac.intro_description:
Watercolor aesthetic

If you’d like to apply beautiful, colorful blends with a watercolor aesthetic to your lettering, this brush set was made for you!

This custom procreate lettering brush set includes 8 unique brushes intended to create watercolor effects within your lettering. An additional 4 high resolution watercolor paper textures are also included to bring your beautiful color blends to life.

Brushes include:

  • round style paintbrush specifically for lettering
  • round paintbrush fine tuned for detailed illustration paintings
  • watercolor bleed brush for creating beautiful, multicolored blends
  • texturizer brush for integrating final watercolor details
  • semi-dry wash for creating painterly effects and distressing edges for a water-blended feel
  • damp smudger for adding final watercolor paper details to your lettering
  • round splatter brush for final paint splatter details
  • bleed splatter brush for rough edged paint splatter details

With countless combinations, you have the freedom to create a unique watercolor lettering outcome that is entirely your own.

Get these brushes for free! The extended license of the full set of these brushes is included when you enroll in my online course, Watercolor Lettering in Procreate

seo.title: Procreate Watercolor Lettering Brush Pack: 8 unique watercolor brush effects
seo.desc: This custom procreate lettering brush set includes 8 unique brushes intended to create watercolor lettering effects. Bonus 4 high resolution watercolor paper textures included.

Skinny Jeans includes 3 fonts: a script style, all caps and symbols font. All styles were designed to pair perfectly together, for super quick layouts and eye-catching outcomes.

What’s included with the Skinny Jeans Font Trio:

  • round style paintbrush specifically for lettering

  • semi-dry brush for creating painterly effects and distressing edges for a water-blended feel
  • damp brush for adding final watercolor paper details to your lettering
  • round splatter brush for final paint splatter details
  • bleed splatter brush for rough edged paint splatter details

With countless combinations, you have the freedom to create a unique watercolor lettering outcome that is entirely your own.

Get these brushes for free! The extended license of the full set of these brushes is included when you enroll in my online course, Watercolor Lettering in Procreate: https://every-tuesday.com/water-procreate

You can also find me every Tuesday sharing a new design, Procreate or lettering tutorial on YouTube: https://youtube.com/everytues

If you’re new to Procreate, check out my free course, Procreate for Beginners! https://every-tuesday.com/procreate-for-beginners

Stationary design using dreamy ink textures
Use ink textures on iPad in Procreate
Dreamy ink textures on transparent backgrounds png files

features.title: Works with Procreate
features.description: These textures can also be used as *transparent* pngs within Procreate! The full instruction guide for installing them on your iPad is available

features.title: 45 high res textures
features.description: All ink and gold textures come as high res (300dpi) transparent pngs and are sized at least 2000px on their longest side. This makes them beautiful and crisp on all common print + web applications!

features.title: Textures created by hand
features.description: Textures were meticulously edited to isolate gold accents and extensive time was spent removing their backgrounds in Photoshop. This helps them to appear as natural as possible so they can be used on different colored or textured backgrounds!

features.title: Gain increased views
features.description: Gain increased views on your physical and digital products, social media posts and online graphics with Dreamy Ink Textures!

dreamy-ink-textures.install_instructions:
Installing Textures

If you are using a desktop/laptop:

These textures can be used on desktops, laptops & tablets. When using them on a desktop or laptop computer, simply save the downloaded zip file after purchase to your hard drive. Unzip and place the file in your design program of choice.

If you are using a tablet:

Install Guide

Note: These textures are very high-rez, slower iPads may see some slower screen performance issues. If you are looking for a more optimized set for the iPad checkout the Watercolor Kit for Procreate.
dreamy-ink-textures.intro_description:
Dreamy Textures

Gain increased views on your physical and digital products, social media posts and online graphics with Dreamy Ink Textures!

These dreamy textures were created by hand, one by one – many of them taking hours to complete. They were then meticulously edited to isolate the gold accents and extensive time was spent removing their backgrounds in Photoshop.

This pack is filled with 15 unique, metallic accented textures, each in 3 colorways for a total of 45 textures! 15 Isolated gold textures are also included to add a punch of shine to any colored or textured background. All ink and gold textures come as high res (300dpi) transparent pngs and are sized at least 2000px on their longest side. This makes them beautiful and crisp on all common print + web applications!

Here’s what’s included:

  • 15 unique metallic accented ink textures
  • 3 colorways for each texture = 45 textures!
  • 15 bonus isolated gold textures
  • All textures are transparent pngs, high res (300dpi), with the longest side at least 2000px

These textures can also be used as *transparent* pngs within Procreate! Click the install instructions tab above to learn how to get them working.

Please note: This is a large zip file (~560MB), so please allow extra time for the download to complete and insure you have a reliable internet connection before beginning the download.

seo.title: Dreamy Ink Textures: 45 unique, metallic accented textures
seo.desc: All ink and gold textures come as high res (300dpi) transparent pngs and are sized at least 2000px on their longest side. This makes them beautiful and crisp on all common print + web applications!

skinny-jeans.name: Skinny Jeans Font Trio

features.title: Script style
features.description: 27 ligatures and alternate, extra large looped y and g for more unique, hand lettered looks.

features.title: Symbols font
features.description: Over 50 unique, hand drawn doodles and illustrations. A different symbol is assigned to ever uppercase and lowercase standard character, plus numbers 0-9.

features.title: Multilingual support
features.description: Western European Languages for both Script + Caps styles. A full font previewer is available here for testing any characters.

features.title: Webfont available
features.description: For uses of Skinny Jeans that *are* intended for sale or to be used for business purposes, please see the Extended License, which also includes the Skinny Jeans webfonts.

skinny-jeans.install_instructions:
Installing Fonts

If you are using a desktop/laptop:

Install Guide

If you are using a tablet:

Install Guide

Note: When a font is installed on your computer, it can be used with any program that allows you to create text. Fonts will work in Microsoft Office applications, Adobe software, and almost any other program with a text editor.
skinny-jeans.intro_description:
Fashion Forward

Introducing Skinny Jeans: a fashion-forward font perfect for high impact headlines, energetic engagements and personality-driven branding, social media posts and messaging.

Skinny Jeans includes 3 fonts: a script style, all caps and symbols font. All styles were designed to pair perfectly together, for super quick layouts and eye-catching outcomes.

What’s included with the Skinny Jeans Font Trio:

  • A Script style with 27 ligatures and alternates, extra large looped y and g for more unique, hand lettered looks
  • An all caps style designed to pair perfectly with Skinny Jeans Script
  • A symbols font with over 50 unique, hand drawn doodles and illustrations. A different symbol is assigned to ever uppercase and lowercase standard character, plus numbers 0-9.
  • All symbols are included as an ai + eps file for versions of Adobe Illustrator, CS3 or newer for your convenience

Multilingual support is included for Western European Languages for both Script + Caps styles. Please test your characters in the font previewer below before purchase.

OTFs of each style are included for the full font trio. (Need access to TTFs? There’s a link included in the info text file)

Enjoy!

seo.title: Skinny Jeans Font Trio
seo.desc: Skinny Jeans includes 3 fonts: a script style, all caps and symbols font. All styles were designed to pair perfectly together, for super quick layouts and eye-catching outcomes.

winter-watercolors.name: Winter Watercolors

features.title: High standard print resolution
features.description: All watercolor elements are high res, 300dpi RGB, so you get get the vibrancy of RGB and if you ever need to convert them to CMYK you'll be good to go!

features.title: 140+ winter watercolors
features.description: This kit is packed with custom arrangements, wreaths, seamless patterns, vectors,  branches & flowers, snow elements, gold elements, and vector lettering phrases.

features.title: Clean Lines
features.description: Every element has been meticulously removed from its background, so you can place them on any colored or textured background without any ugly white edges peeking through.

features.title: Beautiful Stationary Designs
features.description: Create colorful, eye catching personal or branded stationery, invitations, greeting cards, gift tags, gift wrap, labels and more.

winter-watercolors.install_instructions:
Installing Textures

If you are using a desktop/laptop:

These textures can be used on desktops, laptops & tablets. When using them on a desktop or laptop computer, simply save the downloaded zip file after purchase to your hard drive. Unzip and place the file in your design program of choice.

If you are using a tablet:

Install Guide

Note: The vector files included with this kit are not able to be open in Procreate directly. They would need to be saved as jpgs and then imported into the program.
winter-watercolors.intro_description:
140+ Winter Watercolors

Boost your winter stationery designs with this handmade kit!Create colorful, eye catching personal or branded stationery, invitations, greeting cards, gift tags, gift wrap, labels and more. All watercolor elements are high res, 300dpi RGB, so you get get the vibrancy of RGB and retain the high standard print resolution if you ever need to convert them to CMYK.

Here’s what’s included:

  • 5 custom arrangements (transparent pngs)
  • 5 custom wreaths (transparent pngs)
  • 5 original seamless patterns (.pat file + .png pattern squares)
  • 5 vector ribbons (transparent psds)
  • 6 berry branches (transparent pngs)
  • 14 flowers (transparent pngs)
  • 15 leafy branches (transparent pngs)
  • 21 pine branches (transparent pngs)
  • 4 plain branches (transparent pngs)
  • 6 falling snow elements (transparent pngs)
  • 37 gold elements (transparent pngs)
  • 7 watercolor textures (transparent pngs)
  • 37 vector lettering phrases (.psd file with layered smart objects + ai file)

Every watercolor texture and element has been meticulously removed from its background, so you can place any element on any colored or textured background without any ugly white edges peeking through. Every watercolor element is included as a transparent png and can be used with any program where inserting images is permitted.

Note: Please see the images above for the dimensions of each individual element. If you’re using the vectors/patterns, you’ll need Photoshop or Illustrator, CS3 or newer. Enjoy!

seo.title: Winter Watercolors: Create colorful, eye catching stationary
seo.desc: Create colorful, eye catching stationery designs, invitations, gift tags, gift wrap and more with this handmade kit of over 140 winter watercolors!

seo.title: Winter Watercolors: Create colorful, eye catching stationary
seo.desc: Create colorful, eye catching stationery designs, invitations, gift tags, gift wrap and more with this handmade kit of over 140 winter watercolors!

miss-magnolia.name: Miss Magnolia

features.title: Personality-pack your designs
features.description: Perfect for greeting cards, branding, stationery design, social media, packaging, magazine layouts, prints and more!

features.title: Unique Designs with tons of features
features.description: Miss Magnolia has a variety of unique, coded features to create compelling, handmade outcomes: 2 stylistic alternates, 6 initial characters, 1 end character, 3 discretionary ligatures and 10 standard ligatures.

features.title: Need an Extended License?
features.description: Purchase of the Extended License comes with a Certificate (pdf), Miss Magnolia full font (as an otf + ttf), Webfonts (.eot, .woff, .woff2) for Miss Magnolia, and unlimited webfont pageview permissions

features.title: Completely creative designs
features.description: Utilize all caps for a completely alternate style, or mix and match lowercase script + all caps for creative designs.

If you are using a tablet:

Note: When a font is installed on your computer, it can be used with any program that allows you to create text. Fonts will work in Microsoft Office applications, Adobe software, and almost any other program with a text editor.
miss-magnolia.sub_header: A bouncy script filled with Southern charm
miss-magnolia.intro_description:
Personality Packed

Personality-pack your designs with Miss Magnolia; a bouncy script filled with Southern charm.

Perfect for greeting cards, branding, stationery design, social media, packaging, magazine layouts, prints and more! Miss Magnolia was inspired by the song of the same name by Matt Costa.

Miss Magnolia has a variety of unique, coded features to create compelling, handmade outcomes:

  • 2 stylistic alternates
  • Utilize all caps for a completely alternate style, or mix and match lowercase script + all caps for creative designs.
  • 6 initial characters and 1 end character
  • 3 discretionary ligatures
  • 10 standard ligatures

Multilingual support is included for Western European Languages. Please test your characters in the font previewer before purchase.

OTF is included for the full, Miss Magnolia font. (Need access to a TTF? There’s a download link included in the info text file)

Happy Designing!

seo.title: Miss Magnolia: A bouncy script font filled with Southern charm
seo.desc: Miss Magnolia has a variety of unique features to create compelling, handmade outcomes. Perfect for greeting cards, branding, stationery design, social media, packaging and more!

espresso-roast-trio.sub_header: Give your designs a double shot of personality
espresso-roast-trio.intro_description:
Double Shot

Give your designs a double shot of personality with the font trio, Espresso Roast! Included are 3 styles, created to pair perfectly together to bring your designs to life: Caps, Script + Symbols.

Perfect for greeting cards, branding, stationery design, social media, packaging, magazine layouts, prints and more! Need a webfont? The full Espresso Roast font trio set of webfonts with unlimited pageviews permission is included in the extended license.

What’s included with the Espresso Roast Font Trio:

  • A Caps style with 12 double ligatures for more unique, hand drawn looks
  • A full Script style (upper and lowercase)
  • A Symbols font with over 50 unique symbols, plus 10 typeable, seamlessly repeating dividers (use numbers 0-9 to see!). A different symbol is assigned to every letter, upper and lowercase.
  • All symbols are included as an ai + eps file for versions of Adobe Illustrator, CS3 or newer so you can begin using them all right away.
  • 10 standard ligatures

Multilingual support is included for Western European Languages. Please test your characters in the font previewer before purchase.

seo.title: Espresso Roast Font Trio: Give your designs a double shot of personality
seo.desc: Espresso roast includes 3 styles, created to pair perfectly together to bring your designs to life: Caps, Script + Symbols.

corner-bakery.intro_description:
Sweet & Approachable

Introducing Corner Bakery, a mixture of connecting and standalone characters perfect for adding extra originality to anything it’s on.

Its soft edges give off a sweet, approachable vibe and the uppercase characters can be used on their own for added variation and layout hierarchy.

What’s included with Corner Bakery:

  • 8 standard ligatures
  • Standard English characters
  • One end form character

Extended License available and includes:

  • Extended License Certificate (pdf)
  • The Corner Bakery full font (as an otf + ttf)
  • Webfonts (.eot, .woff, .woff2) for Corner Bakery
  • Unlimited webfont pageview permissions

seo.title: Corner Bakery: A sweet, approachable font with soft edges
seo.desc: Perfect for adding extra originality to anything. Its soft edges and uppercase characters can be used on their own for added variation and layout hierarchy.

Double Shot

Give your designs a double shot of personality with the font trio, Espresso Roast! Included are 3 styles, created to pair perfectly together to bring your designs to life: Caps, Script + Symbols.

Perfect for greeting cards, branding, stationery design, social media, packaging, magazine layouts, prints and more! Need a webfont? The full Espresso Roast font trio set of webfonts with unlimited pageviews permission is included in the extended license.

What’s included with the Espresso Roast Font Trio:

  • A Caps style with 12 double ligatures for more unique, hand drawn looks
  • A full Script style (upper and lowercase)
  • A Symbols font with over 50 unique symbols, plus 10 typeable, seamlessly repeating dividers (use numbers 0-9 to see!). A different symbol is assigned to every letter, upper and lowercase.
  • All symbols are included as an ai + eps file for versions of Adobe Illustrator, CS3 or newer so you can begin using them all right away.
  • 10 standard ligatures

Multilingual support is included for Western European Languages. Please test your characters in the font previewer before purchase.

seo.title: Corner Bakery: A sweet, approachable vibe with soft edges
seo.desc: Perfect for adding extra originality to anything. Its soft edges and uppercase characters can be used on their own for added variation and layout hierarchy.

item.name: Watercolor Leaves and Florals Kit: Extended

features.title: Handmade touch
features.description: Add a handmade touch filled with personality and vibrant color with this kit of over 50 watercolor leaves and floral elements!

features.title: Bonus Watercolor Textures
features.description: As a bonus, 5 watercolor textures are included, as well as 5 watercolor texture splatters. Every texture and element has been meticulously removed from its background, so you can place any element on any background.

features.title: Ultra Highrez
features.description: All watercolor elements are high res, 300dpi RGB, so you get get the vibrancy of RGB and retain the high standard print resolution if you ever need to convert them to CMYK.

features.title: 33 different combinations
features.description: This kit is packed with 11 unique floral arrangements and bouquets, each in 3 different color palettes for a total of 33 combinations, 7 flower bunches, 12 plants and leaves and 24 single flowers.

watercolor-leaves-and-florals-kit.install_instructions:
Installing Textures

If you are using a desktop/laptop:

These textures can be used on desktops, laptops & tablets. When using them on a desktop or laptop computer, simply save the downloaded zip file after purchase to your hard drive. Unzip and place the file in your design program of choice.

If you are using a tablet:

Install Guide

Note: These textures are very high-rez, slower iPads may see some slower screen performance issues.
watercolor-leaves-and-florals-kit.intro_description:
Vibrant Colors

Add a handmade touch filled with personality and vibrant color with this kit of over 50 watercolor leaves and floral elements!

Create colorful, eye catching personal or branded stationery, invitations, wedding pieces, art prints, labels and more. All watercolor elements are high res, 300dpi RGB, so you get get the vibrancy of RGB and retain the high standard print resolution if you ever need to convert them to CMYK. Please click on the final preview image above for the dimensions of each individual element.

Every texture and element has been meticulously removed from its background, so you can place any element on any colored or textured background without any ugly white edges peeking through. Every element is included as a transparent png and can be used with any program where inserting images is permitted.

This kit is packed with:

  • 11 unique floral arrangements and bouquets, each in 3 different color palettes for a total of 33 combinations
  • 7 flower bunches
  • 12 plants and leaves
  • 24 single flowers
  •  BONUS watercolor textures
  • 5 BONUS watercolor texture splatters

These textures can also be used as *transparent* pngs within Procreate! Click the install instructions tab above to learn how to get them working.

seo.title: Watercolor Leaves and Florals Kit: Handmade elements filled with personality
seo.desc: Over 50 watercolor leaves and floral elements! Packed with unique floral arrangements and bouquets, flower bunches, plants, leaves and single flowers.

hawthorne-script.name: Hawthorne Script

images.alt: Hawthorne Script Hand Lettered Greeting Cards

features.title: Extensive language compatibility
features.description: Includes the following: English, German, Dutch, Italian, French, Portuguese, Spanish, Turkish, Polish, Hungarian, Croatian, Czech, Slovak, Slovenian, Bosnian, Albanian, Estonian, Catalan, Danish, Faroese, Finnish, Icelandic and Norwegian.

features.title: Packed with Features
features.description: Hawthorne Script comes packed with a full alternate lowercase to make any word more original plus 9 standard ligatures, 10 bonus swashes (5 left side, 5 right side)

features.title: Customizable Alternates
features.description: Alter the look of any lowercase character by highlighting it and changing it to Hawthorne Script Alternates for more varied looks!

features.title: Software Compatibility
features.description: A link to the TTF files (if needed) are included for both the Regular and Alternate styles of the font for those who may have software that isn't compatible with open type features.

hawthorne-script.install_instructions:
Installing Fonts

If you are using a desktop/laptop:

Install Guide

If you are using a tablet:

Install Guide

Note: When a font is installed on your computer, it can be used with any program that allows you to create text. Fonts will work in Microsoft Office applications, Adobe software, and almost any other program with a text editor.
hawthorne-script.intro_description:
Sophisticated Script Font

Introducing Hawthorne Script: a hand lettered, sophisticated script with a little bounce.

Hawthorne Script comes packed with a full alternate lowercase to make any word more original plus:

  • 9 standard ligatures
  • 10 bonus swashes (5 left side, 5 right side)
  • Extensive language compatibility which includes the following: English, German, Dutch, Italian, French, Portuguese, Spanish, Turkish, Polish, Hungarian, Croatian, Czech, Slovak, Slovenian, Bosnian, Albanian, Estonian, Catalan, Danish, Faroese, Finnish, Icelandic and Norwegian.
  • Please use the font editor to check for any characters you may be unsure of.

This download includes 2 otf files: Hawthorne Script Regular and Hawthorne Script Alternates. Alter the look of any lowercase character by highlighting it and changing it to Hawthorne Script Alternates for more varied looks.

A link to the TTF files (if needed) are included for both the Regular and Alternate styles of the font for those who may have software that isn’t compatible with open type features.

Need a webfont? The Hawthorne Script webfont is included in the extended license and includes permissions for unlimited monthly pageviews.

seo.title: Hawthorne Script: A hand lettered, sophisticated script with a little bounce
seo.desc: Hawthorne Script comes packed with a full alternate lowercase, 9 standard ligatures, 10 bonus swashes (5 left & right side) + extensive language compatibility.

tuesday-script.sub_header: A bouncy, hand lettered brush script font with lots of personality
tuesday-script.intro_description:
Hand Lettered

Introducing Tuesday Script! A bouncy, hand lettered brush script font with lots of personality.

Tuesday Script contains 4 bonus standard characters and 7 stylistic swashes to add quick accents to your designs. Simply access them through the Glyphs palettes in programs like Illustrator or InDesign. If you don’t have these programs, you’ll still have access to all of the standard and international characters.

Tuesday Script contains multilingual support with accented characters for international (Western European, Central European and South Eastern European) users. Please test your characters in the font previewer below before purchase.

OTF and a link to the TTF in the info text file are included for the full font.

Need a webfont? The full Tuesday Script webfont with unlimited pageviews permission is included when you select the extended license.

seo.title: Tuesday Script: A bouncy, hand lettered brush script font with lots of personality
seo.desc: Introducing Tuesday Script! A bouncy, hand lettered brush script font with lots of personality. Includes 4 bonus standard characters and 7 stylistic swashes.

images.alt: Watercolor texture kit vol. 3 greeting cards
Watercolor texture kit vol. 3 iphone covers

watercolor-texture-kit-vol-3.install_instructions:
Installing Textures

If you are using a desktop/laptop:

These textures can be used on desktops, laptops & tablets. When using them on a desktop or laptop computer, simply save the downloaded zip file after purchase to your hard drive. Unzip and place the file in your design program of choice.

If you are using a tablet:

Install Guide

Note: These textures are very high-rez, slower iPads may see some slower screen performance issues. If you are looking for a more optimized set for the iPad checkout the Watercolor Kit for Procreate.
watercolor-texture-kit-vol-3.sub_header: Vibrant seamless, repeatable watercolor texture patterns
watercolor-texture-kit-vol-3.intro_description:
Vibrant Color

Add serious vibrant color and detail with this kit packed with 32 unique watercolor textures.

Gain increased views on your physical and digital products, social media posts and online graphics with Dreamy Ink Textures!

All 32 textures come as high res, 300ppi RGB psds and transparent pngs – so you get the vibrancy of RGB and retain the high standard print resolution if you’d like to convert to CMYK for prints. And – with the included transparent pngs, place the textures on any background and never worry about having to mask unnecessary white from your edges..it’s already done for you 🙂

Create colorful custom logos, posters, stationery, social media posts, invitations and digital posts with an authentic handmade feel in a snap!

Here’s what’s included:

  • 32 unique watercolor textures
  • 12 seamless, repeatable watercolor texture patterns
  • 2 bonus watercolor paper patterns
  •  All 32 textures come as high res, 300ppi RGB psds and transparent pngs

These *transparent* pngs textures can also be used within Procreate! Click the install instructions tab above to learn how to get them working.

Please note: All textures have a longest side of at least 2000px @300ppi and all patterns were created at 2000px @300ppi – a high enough size and resolution for all common print and web uses!

seo.title: Watercolor Texture Kit Vol. 3: Vibrant seamless, repeatable watercolor texture patterns
seo.desc: Add serious vibrant color and detail with this kit packed with 32 watercolor textures, 12 seamless, repeatable watercolor texture patterns and 2 bonus watercolor paper patterns.

watercolor-texture-kit-vol-3-extended.name: Watercolor Texture Kit Vol. 3: Extended
watercolor-texture-kit-vol-3-extended.install_instructions:
Installing Textures

If you are using a desktop/laptop:

These textures can be used on desktops, laptops & tablets. When using them on a desktop or laptop computer, simply save the downloaded zip file after purchase to your hard drive. Unzip and place the file in your design program of choice.

If you are using a tablet:

Install Guide

Note: These textures are very high-rez, slower iPads may see some slower screen performance issues. If you are looking for a more optimized set for the iPad checkout the Watercolor Kit for Procreate.
watercolor-texture-kit-vol-3-extended.sub_header: Vibrant seamless, repeatable watercolor texture patterns
watercolor-texture-kit-vol-3-extended.intro_description:
Dreamy Textures

Gain increased views on your physical and digital products, social media posts and online graphics with Dreamy Ink Textures!

These dreamy textures were created by hand, one by one – many of them taking hours to complete. They were then meticulously edited to isolate the gold accents and extensive time was spent removing their backgrounds in Photoshop.

This pack is filled with 15 unique, metallic accented textures, each in 3 colorways for a total of 45 textures! 15 Isolated gold textures are also included to add a punch of shine to any colored or textured background. All ink and gold textures come as high res (300dpi) transparent pngs and are sized at least 2000px on their longest side. This makes them beautiful and crisp on all common print + web applications!

Here’s what’s included:

  • 15 unique metallic accented ink textures
  • 3 colorways for each texture = 45 textures!
  • 15 bonus isolated gold textures
  • All textures are transparent pngs, high res (300dpi), with the longest side at least 2000px

These textures can also be used as *transparent* pngs within Procreate! Click the install instructions tab above to learn how to get them working.

Please note: This is a large zip file (~560MB), so please allow extra time for the download to complete and insure you have a reliable internet connection before beginning the download.

seo.title: Watercolor Texture Kit Vol. 3: Vibrant seamless, repeatable watercolor texture patterns
seo.desc: Add serious vibrant color and detail with this kit packed with 32 watercolor textures, 12 seamless, repeatable watercolor texture patterns and 2 bonus watercolor paper patterns.

glitz-glam-kit.name: Glitz + Glam Kit

images.alt: Glitz and Glam foil brushes in photoshop
Glitz and Glam foil vector elements
Glitz and Glam foil texture kit for photoshop

features.title: Digital Foil and Glitter Kit
features.description: Quickly and easily (with just one click!) apply digital foil and glitter textures to typography, vector elements and confetti brush styles.

features.title: Ultra High Rez Images
features.description: All textures were created at 2000px x 2000px @300dpi RGB for maximum, high resolution use. Be sure to click on the preview images above to see full details of everything included!

features.title: Excellent Support
features.description: Please view the video overview for easy installation and quick usage! If you have any questions, don't hesitate to contact me, I'm happy to help!

features.title: Dynamic Brush Styles
features.description: The kit comes with 12 unique + dynamic pressure sensitive photoshop brushes. Each brush is realistic with scatter and rotations as you paint with the brush.

glitz-glam-kit.install_instructions:
Installing Textures

If you are using a desktop/laptop:

These textures can be used on desktops, laptops & tablets. When using them on a desktop or laptop computer, simply save the downloaded zip file after purchase to your hard drive. Unzip and place the file in your design program of choice.

If you are using a tablet:

Install Guide

Note: These textures are very high-rez, slower iPads may see some slower screen performance issues.
glitz-glam-kit.intro_description:
Glitterize your layouts

Punch up your designs and create impressive, digital foil and glitterized layouts with the Glitz + Glam Kit!

Easily apply foil + glitter layer styles to typography, vector elements, brushes and more with one click (see the video in the preview for proof ;)!

All textures were created at 2000px x 2000px @300dpi RGB for maximum, high resolution use. Be sure to click on the preview images above to see full details of everything included!

This kit is packed with:

  • 12 unique foil + glitter layer styles in 3 metallics: gold, silver and black (36 total)
  • 12 dynamic confetti brush styles
  • 100% Seamless pattern files for all textures (36 in all)
  • 100% Seamless, high res jpgs of every texture (36 in all)
  • Over 50 vector elements as an ai, eps + psd file for CS3 or newer

These textures can also be used as *transparent* pngs within Procreate! Click the install instructions tab above to learn how to get them working.

seo.title: Glitz + Glam Kit: Punch up your designs with digital foil and glitterized styles
seo.desc: Punch up your designs and create impressive, digital foil and glitterized layouts with the Glitz + Glam Kit! This kit is packed with tons of elements to make your designs pop.

vector-leaves-flourish-kit.name: Vector Leaves + Flourish Kit

images.alt: Vector Leaves and Flourishes kit for Adobe Illustrator svgs
Hand Drawn Vector Leaves and Flourishes kit for Adobe Illustrator svgs
Hand Drawn Vector Leaves and Flourishes kit bonuses

features.title: Hand Drawn
features.description: Dress up your blog, social media accounts, custom artwork and more with this set of over 100 hand drawn vector leaves and flourishes!

features.title: 100% Vector
features.description: Every element has been meticulously edited after vectorization to retain the hand drawn feel and maintain clean edges so no matter where you use any element, it will hold up perfectly and print like a charm!

features.title: Compatibility
features.description: All elements come as an ai + eps file that can be opened with versions of Adobe Illustrator, CS3 or newer

features.title: Bonus Vectors
features.description: Bonus elements added to the set include banner elements, a dragonfly, arrows, hearts and stars, just because :)

vector-leaves-flourish-kit.install_instructions:
Installing Textures

If you are using a desktop/laptop:

These textures can be used on desktops, laptops & tablets. When using them on a desktop or laptop computer, simply save the downloaded zip file after purchase to your hard drive. Unzip and place the file in your design program of choice.

If you are using a tablet:

Install Guide

Note: The vector files included with this kit are not able to be open in Procreate directly. They would need to be saved as jpgs and then imported into the program.
vector-leaves-flourish-kit.intro_description:
140+ Winter Watercolors

Boost your winter stationery designs with this handmade kit!Create colorful, eye catching personal or branded stationery, invitations, greeting cards, gift tags, gift wrap, labels and more. All watercolor elements are high res, 300dpi RGB, so you get get the vibrancy of RGB and retain the high standard print resolution if you ever need to convert them to CMYK.

Here’s what’s included:

  • 5 custom arrangements (transparent pngs)
  • 5 custom wreaths (transparent pngs)
  • 5 original seamless patterns (.pat file + .png pattern squares)
  • 5 vector ribbons (transparent psds)
  • 6 berry branches (transparent pngs)
  • 14 flowers (transparent pngs)
  • 15 leafy branches (transparent pngs)
  • 21 pine branches (transparent pngs)
  • 4 plain branches (transparent pngs)
  • 6 falling snow elements (transparent pngs)
  • 37 gold elements (transparent pngs)
  • 7 watercolor textures (transparent pngs)
  • 37 vector lettering phrases (.psd file with layered smart objects + ai file)

Every watercolor texture and element has been meticulously removed from its background, so you can place any element on any colored or textured background without any ugly white edges peeking through. Every watercolor element is included as a transparent png and can be used with any program where inserting images is permitted.

Note: Please see the images above for the dimensions of each individual element. If you’re using the vectors/patterns, you’ll need Photoshop or Illustrator, CS3 or newer. Enjoy!

seo.title: Vector Leaves + Flourish Kit: 100+ hand drawn vectors with bonuses
seo.desc: Dress up your blog, social media accounts, custom artwork and more with this set of over 100 hand drawn vector leaves and flourishes!

vector-leaves-flourish-kit-extended.name: Vector Leaves + Flourish Kit: Extended

features.title: Hand Drawn
features.description: Dress up your blog, social media accounts, custom artwork and more with this set of over 100 hand drawn vector leaves and flourishes!

features.title: 100% Vector
features.description: Every element has been meticulously edited after vectorization to retain the hand drawn feel and maintain clean edges so no matter where you use any element, it will hold up perfectly and print like a charm!

features.title: Compatibility
features.description: All elements come as an ai + eps file that can be opened with versions of Adobe Illustrator, CS3 or newer

features.title: Bonus Vectors
features.description: Bonus elements added to the set include banner elements, a dragonfly, arrows, hearts and stars, just because :)

vector-leaves-flourish-kit-extended.install_instructions:
Installing Textures

If you are using a desktop/laptop:

These textures can be used on desktops, laptops & tablets. When using them on a desktop or laptop computer, simply save the downloaded zip file after purchase to your hard drive. Unzip and place the file in your design program of choice.

If you are using a tablet:

Install Guide

Note: The vector files included with this kit are not able to be open in Procreate directly. They would need to be saved as jpgs and then imported into the program.
vector-leaves-flourish-kit-extended.intro_description:
140+ Winter Watercolors

Boost your winter stationery designs with this handmade kit!Create colorful, eye catching personal or branded stationery, invitations, greeting cards, gift tags, gift wrap, labels and more. All watercolor elements are high res, 300dpi RGB, so you get get the vibrancy of RGB and retain the high standard print resolution if you ever need to convert them to CMYK.

Here’s what’s included:

  • 5 custom arrangements (transparent pngs)
  • 5 custom wreaths (transparent pngs)
  • 5 original seamless patterns (.pat file + .png pattern squares)
  • 5 vector ribbons (transparent psds)
  • 6 berry branches (transparent pngs)
  • 14 flowers (transparent pngs)
  • 15 leafy branches (transparent pngs)
  • 21 pine branches (transparent pngs)
  • 4 plain branches (transparent pngs)
  • 6 falling snow elements (transparent pngs)
  • 37 gold elements (transparent pngs)
  • 7 watercolor textures (transparent pngs)
  • 37 vector lettering phrases (.psd file with layered smart objects + ai file)

Every watercolor texture and element has been meticulously removed from its background, so you can place any element on any colored or textured background without any ugly white edges peeking through. Every watercolor element is included as a transparent png and can be used with any program where inserting images is permitted.

Note: Please see the images above for the dimensions of each individual element. If you’re using the vectors/patterns, you’ll need Photoshop or Illustrator, CS3 or newer. Enjoy!

seo.title: Vector Leaves + Flourish Kit: 100+ hand drawn vectors with bonuses
seo.desc: Dress up your blog, social media accounts, custom artwork and more with this set of over 100 hand drawn vector leaves and flourishes!

watercolor-texture-kit-vol-1.name: Watercolor Texture Kit Vol. 1

images.alt: How to use Watercolor Texture Kit

features.title: High Rez
features.description: All 40 pieces come as high res, 300dpi RGB jpgs and transparent pngs - so you get the vibrancy of RGB and retain the high standard print resolution if you'd like to convert to CMYK for prints.

features.title: Transparent PNG's
features.description: With the included transparent pngs, place the textures on any background and never worry about having to mask unnecessary white from your edges..it's already done for you :)

features.title: Tons of Possibilities
features.description: Create colorful custom logos, posters, stationery, social media posts, invitations and digital posts with an authentic handmade feel in a snap!

features.title: Packed with tons of items
features.description: A full 40 piece watercolor texture kit that includes 20 high res textures, 8 circle shaped textures, 5 texture splatters and 7 smart object blobs

watercolor-texture-kit-vol-1.install_instructions:
Installing Textures

If you are using a desktop/laptop:

These textures can be used on desktops, laptops & tablets. When using them on a desktop or laptop computer, simply save the downloaded zip file after purchase to your hard drive. Unzip and place the file in your design program of choice.

If you are using a tablet:

Install Guide

Note: These textures are very high-rez, slower iPads may see some slower screen performance issues. If you are looking for a more optimized set for the iPad checkout the Watercolor Kit for Procreate.

video_thumbnail.alt: How to Add Watercolor Textures to Typography

watercolor-texture-kit-vol-1.intro_description:
Vibrant Color

Add serious vibrant color and detail with this kit packed with 32 unique watercolor textures.

Gain increased views on your physical and digital products, social media posts and online graphics with Dreamy Ink Textures!

All 32 textures come as high res, 300ppi RGB psds and transparent pngs – so you get the vibrancy of RGB and retain the high standard print resolution if you’d like to convert to CMYK for prints. And – with the included transparent pngs, place the textures on any background and never worry about having to mask unnecessary white from your edges..it’s already done for you 🙂

Create colorful custom logos, posters, stationery, social media posts, invitations and digital posts with an authentic handmade feel in a snap!

Here’s what’s included:

  • 32 unique watercolor textures
  • 12 seamless, repeatable watercolor texture patterns
  • 2 bonus watercolor paper patterns
  •  All 32 textures come as high res, 300ppi RGB psds and transparent pngs

These *transparent* pngs textures can also be used within Procreate! Click the install instructions tab above to learn how to get them working.

Please note: All textures have a longest side of at least 2000px @300ppi and all patterns were created at 2000px @300ppi – a high enough size and resolution for all common print and web uses!

seo.title: Watercolor Texture Kit Vol. 1: 40 piece Watercolor Texture Kit
seo.desc: All 40 pieces come as high res, 300dpi RGB jpgs and transparent pngs - so you get the vibrancy of RGB and retain the high standard print resolution .
